title: Call of Kythshire
description: Alternate Cover edition for ASIN B00UVLQWGYThe existence of the fairies of Kythshire is a secret kept for over a century...  Azaeli has trained from a young age in order to follow in her parents' footsteps and become a Knight of His Majesty's Elite. When she finally becomes a Squire, her name is mysteriously left off of the list for the King's Quest. Her parents set off without her, but the simple quest goes awry leaving tragedy in its wake. With the help of her lifelong friend, Rian, a Mage apprentice, Azaeli must unravel a sinister plot that threatens both the existence of Kythshire and the peace that her people have celebrated for generations.
author: Missy Sheldrake
